PipelineTraining¶

module PipelineTraining

Train several pipelines according to multiple provided configurations. That is to say that it trains a possible ensemble classifier. .. todo:: Use MLflow to track the model trained.

Module Contents¶

PipelineTraining.generateClassifReport(y_test, y_pred)¶

generateClassifReport

Generate a report of the classifier performance based on its outputs and reference (test) labels.

Parameters

  • y_test (np.array) – Expected labels.

  • y_pred (np.array) – Predicted labels.

Returns

The human readable report.

Return type

str

PipelineTraining.trainClassifier(config, path, classifierName, automl=False)¶

trainClassifier

Trains a classifier for a single configuration.

Parameters

  • config (list(any)) – Classifier configuration

  • path (str (dirPath)) – Location of classifier export.

  • classifierName – Name of the classifier that will be used to name the

exported file. :type classifierName: str :param automl: Assert if single model AutoML (TPOT) should be used, defaults to False. :type automl: bool, optional :return: The trained model :rtype: sklearn.model

PipelineTraining.trainPipeline(configs, path, automl=True)¶

trainPipeline

Generate multiple classifier as part of the pipeline as well as voting procedure.

Parameters

  • configs (list(list(any))) – Configurations of all subclassifiers

  • path (str (dirPath)) – Destination for the export of models

  • automl (bool, optional) – Assert if AutoML should be used, defaults to True

PipelineTraining.evaluatePipeline(path, nbconf, config, voteSent=None, voteClause=None, voteMode=None)¶

evaluatePipeline

Evaluate the quality of classification of a pipeline by loading a part of the dataset.

Parameters

  • path (str (dirPath)) – Directory containing the models of the pipeline.

  • nbconf (int) – Number of configurations considered.

  • config (list(any)) – Configurations, contraining information to load the dataset.

  • voteSent – Default election element at sentence level,

defaults to None :type voteSent: str, optional :param voteClause: Default election element at clause level, defaults to None :type voteClause: str, optional :param voteMode: Type of election performed on clause (to aggregate outputs of models), defaults to None :type voteMode: str, optional

Returns

Achieved f1_score

Return type

float

Returns

Expected values

Return type

np.array

Returns

Predicted values

Return type

np.array

PipelineTraining.evaluatePipelineDebug(path, nbconf)¶

evaluatePipelineDebug

Pipeline evaluation for ML conception and debugging.

Parameters

  • path (str (dirPath)) – Directory containing the models of the pipeline.

  • nbconf (int) – Number of configurations considered.

Returns

Achieved f1_score

Return type

float
